HediffDef.label: storing duralumin
HediffDef.description: This pawn is storing Connection in a duralumin metalmind, severing bonds with people, places, and concepts. They become spiritually untethered — less grounded, less known. This may reduce social or cultural influence but allows deep storage of spiritual ties.

HediffDef.label: tapping duralumin
HediffDef.description: This pawn is tapping a duralumin metalmind, intensifying their Connection to others. Bonds strengthen, allegiances deepen, and ties to people or places become nearly unbreakable. Useful for bonding, commanding, or interacting with spiritual systems.
